Don't let your babies grow up to be trainers
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Don't let your babies grow up to be trainers
By CHB on Thursday, October 5, 2000 - 08:35 pm:

Mommas, don't let your babies grow up to be trainers, it is a life with few bounds.

Mommas, don't let your babies grow up to be trainers, or they may never come back around.

If there ever was a life filled with as much joy as there was sorrow, its the life of the trainer that makes them wonder about tommorow.

So mommas, don't let your babies grow up to be trainers, though this is the only life for people like me.

Mommas don't let your babies grow up to be trainers, though theres no other place I'd rather be.

So mommas, if you let your babies grow up to be trainers, they may just be a fine one indeed.


Fín
